sellerCard.oneLiner: 'Order Now' and Join the Club of My 200 Plus Happy Clients!
sellerCard.description: I am Saim Abbas, a Computer Science graduate and a certified frontend web developer with 5 years of working experience.  As a part of my work, I bring ideas to life doing website development in Html Css, Javascript, React, NextJs, Gsap, ThreeJs, WordPress, and Webflow. On top of that, I've contributed as a frontend engineer and project manager at multiple agencies including 5D Solutions LLC, Unchained Robotics and Uptrend Agency. Having developed the frontend for 200+ websites, I’m prepared to deliver the same exceptional results for your project. Drop me a message and let's kick things off!

description.content:
React Excellence? That's Me, Your Got Your React JS Developer!


I am Saim Abbas, a certified react developer with 5 years of working experience. Having developed the frontend for 300+ websites, I'm prepared to deliver the same exceptional results for your project.

I take pride in providing my clients `A Sound Balance of Quality, Price, and Time.`


My Service Includes:

  • Frontend Development in React js, Next js, Javascript, Typescript, Html5, Css3.
  • Well-commented code
  • Manageable react components
  • API Integration
  • React Frontend website will be responsive, cross-browser compatible, seo-optimized, and speed-optimized.
  • Top-Tier 2D/3D web animations
  • UI/UX web design
  • Easy and effective Communications


Tools & Tech

Html Css, Javascript, JQuery, Typescript, React js, Next js, Firebase, Redux, API Integration, Axios, Sass, Bootstrap, MUI, Tailwind Css, Ant Design, Styled Components, Gsap, Three.js, GitHub, Figma


Please acknowledge that I don't work on music, alcohol, the adult industry, or dating sites.

Drop me a message and let's kick things off!


Regards,

Saim Abbas | Webexhaust

questionsAndAnswers.question: What's your process for keeping the project on track and ensuring timely delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I utilize project management tools and regular check-ins/updates to ensure everything is on track. Additionally, I'll provide you with a timeline at the project's outset.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I face any issues after the website goes live, how can I reach out to you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm always here to help! You can reach out to me via Fiverr, email, or any preferred communication method, and I'll address any concerns promptly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you also provide ongoing website maintenance after the project is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing maintenance packages. We can discuss the details and tailor a plan to suit your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to provide the website content, or can you assist with that?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While most clients provide content, I can assist in content creation or recommend professional copywriters to ensure your website's content is compelling.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate third-party APIs or plugins into the React website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I have extensive experience integrating a variety of third-party APIs and plugins. Just let me know what you need, and I'll handle it.

packageList.title: BASIC

reviews.comment: Saim did a great job, I recommend him 100%
Consistently exceeds expectations. A true professional in development.

Amazing experience! The developer was very communicative and understood my requirements perfectly. The final product was delivered on time and with outstanding quality. Their attention to detail made all the difference. Will definitely hire again!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for your kind words Nick! :)

reviews.comment: This developer is an exceptional problem solver. They quickly identified and fixed issues on our website, improving its performance significantly. Their proactive approach and deep understanding of web development standards are commendable. Highly recommended for complex projects!

I am thoroughly impressed with the professionalism and reliability shown by this developer. They consistently met deadlines and were always available to address any concerns. Their technical expertise and dedication were evident in the quality of their work.

seller_response.comment: Professional clients make work much easier! Thanks Nick :)
